org.microtitan.diffusive.diffuser.serializer

Class PersistenceSerializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.microtitan.diffusive.diffuser.serializer.PersistenceSerializer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JsonPersistenceSerializer, KeyValuePersistenceSerializer, XmlPersistenceSerializer

    public class PersistenceSerializer
extends java.lang.Object
implements Serializer
    Serializes objects into a serializes for specified by the Persistence engine, and deserializes that form back into objects using the same Persistence engine.
    Author:
    Robert Philipp

        Description copied from interface: Serializer
        Reads a Java object representation from the specified InputStream and creates and returns the fully constructed Java object of the specified type.
